data.actual_result: Server list is scrolled to the top
data.expected_result: Server list should remain in the same position as when you closed it
data.short_description: Server list scrolls to the top if you tap the top left corner of your screen while in a server
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a random server - Scroll down the server list so you aren't at the top - Close the server list and open a channel - Tap the top left corner of your screen above the three bars (make sure you tap above the three bars in this step, and don't open the list) - Open the server list
